img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is approaching a stone monument or altar situated in a rocky environment. The character is holding a staff and is climbing a set of stone steps surrounded by tall grass. A red dashed circle highlights an object on the altar, suggesting it is of interest or importance. The setting appears to be outdoors, with rocky cliffs and sparse vegetation visible.
